review: I keep having connection issues. I used the HDMI extension, resetted the device, and followed the steps on the help page but nothing works. I have cellphones and computers close to the stick and they have strong signal and perfect connection. When the device finds the network it says it has strong signal, but 2 seconds later the network is gone. When connected I can't even use the device because network speed is too slow. Netflix keeps loading after 10 seconds watching.I'm disappointed by this device.
